}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "Ver:A0-0'13/01/10" (or something like that) and "Made in China" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
A ''[[Cameo]]'' manufactured RTL8821AU device in ''[[Realtek]]'''s vendor driver set for the 8812au has a USB ID of '''2001:3314'''..
{{See also|D-Link DWA-171 rev B1}} {{WiFiCert|WFA19011|03/08/2013}}
*WIP Driver on [https://github.com/ulli-kroll/rtl8821au rtl8821au]
